name: Wolverine Men's Hudson Steel Toe Mid Sr Hiler Fashion Boot
product_description: Established in Rockford, Michigan in 1883, Wolverine is an iconic American brand that combines superior materials with timeless craftsmanship. Wolverine boots are built to withstand the toughest of environments and provide all day comfort. Today, Wolverine leads the industry with a relentless commitment to innovation and patented technologies including Wolverine Contour Welt, Wolverine MultiShox, Wolverine Durashocks, Wolverine DuraShocks SR and Wolverine Fusion. name: Timberland PRO mens External Met Guard 6 Inch Steel Safety Toe
product_description: This sturdy work boot won't ease up when things get tough. Constructed with a highly abrasion-resistant Ever-Guard leather upper, this ankle boot features our unique Timberland PRO 24/7 Comfort System technology that meets the most rigorous worksite demands while helping reduce foot fatigue by supporting your arch and cushioning every step. For hardworking impact, safety, and heat protection, we also added an external, hinged metatarsal guard that even offers protection when squatting, a steel safety toe, electrical hazard protection, a durable steel shank, heat-resistant thread on the upper and welt, and a heat-, oil-, slip-, and abrasion-resistant, non-marking rubber outsole for rugged traction. The breathable, moisture-wicking lining is made of ReBOTL material containing at least 50% recycled plastic.

name: Timberland PRO mens Direct Attach 6" Steel Safety Toe Insulated Waterproof Industrial Work Boot
product_description: Inspired by our original yellow boots, these Timberland PRO Direct Attach boots are waterproof and have 200 grams of insulation to help keep you dry and warm in cold-weather environments. From their premium Timberland seam-sealed, waterproof leather uppers with comfortable padded collars to their heat-, oil-, slip-, and abrasion-resistant rubber lug outsoles for enhanced traction, these steel-toe boots are ready to get to work. We also added electrical hazard protection and Anti-Fatigue Technology polyurethane footbeds for all-day shock absorption and energy return, plus breathable, moisture-wicking linings made of ReBOTL fabric containing at least 50% recycled plastic. Modeled from Timberland's classic style work boot, the Direct Attach has it all and then some. With all of its comfort and hardworking technology, you would think this rugged leather boot had a mind of its own.
